title: Halloween Kills Trailer Reactions
description:
The boys react to the new Halloween Kills trailer.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: welcome back to another kind of funny trailer reaction as always i'm tim gettys joined by greg miller hi i'm nick's carpino hello and snow bike mike what up what am i doing here i don't know but it's exciting it feels different and fun we're reacting to the halloween kills trailer this is the sequel to the 2018 halloween movie that was a sequel to the original halloween uh from john carpenter back in the day very exciting stuff i loved the 2018 one nick i remember you being very fond of it as well loved it absolutely very excited that they're continuing that i thought it was a cool take on uh that story and it was great to see jamie curtis come back and just slay out hell yes mike did you see that one oh yeah i watched that it haunted my dreams for a number of weeks i actually came home from the theater and put all of my luggage in front of the hotel door and hope to god that they didn't kill me in my dreams well i'm glad you're still with us greg i don't remember if you were with us

the theater and put all of my luggage in front of the hotel door and hope to god that they didn't kill me in my dreams well i'm glad you're still with us greg i don't remember if you were with us uh watching have you seen the 2018 of course come on it's a horror movie of course i've seen it yeah i remember enjoying it i don't remember being uh blown away by it like i don't i remember the ending or whatever with all our tricks and stuff in the house but that was about it but i enjoyed it i remember i'm excited for another one yep i am very very excited we know that this is part two of a trilogy they're doing they're gonna be year after year this was supposed to come out last year but the world is what it is so without further ado let's check out the halloween kills official trailer i can't see you i was like that's not gonna go well for him mike's gonna get you [Music] that's [ __ ] cool oh my god that was a great way to get him out of the situation the firefighters is just coming safe

see you i was like that's not gonna go well for him mike's gonna get you [Music] that's [ __ ] cool oh my god that was a great way to get him out of the situation the firefighters is just coming safe it's over we can't hurt anyone ever again how many times he's gonna fall for this thing so many people just there so many i love that time and i love to keep should not have to keep running evil dies tonight [Music] i'm not just gonna sit and watch another person if you track michael's victims that's a straight line to michael's childhood home season we fight let's hunt him down there's like a whole town versus michael myers but a man he's not oh my god they're all chanting evil eyes tonight the more he kills the more he transcends [Music] [Applause] [Music] eminem i love anthony michael hall his career has kept going he just pops up in random side things and you're like sure cool like he did like a like a six episode stint on psych and you're like okay you were in weird science remember

his career has kept going he just pops up in random side things and you're like sure cool like he did like a like a six episode stint on psych and you're like okay you were in weird science remember when he was in batman yeah it was awesome i'm so stoked for this the 2018 sequel was so good because it just knew what it was trying to be and just committed to that vision of just like like actually following up what happened in the first movie but like modernizing it in a way that makes sense having jamie lee curtis be kind of crazy kind of a reckless like yeah it's yeah this is starting right when the other one ends and then building to the town going like yeah uniting really cool that's a really cool angle on it yeah that's really cool yeah i agree i would not i would not have thought that i would thought okay you're gonna do a sequel it's gonna be basically the same movie they've done about a billion times now with just the monster killing everything and never being able to die but

i would thought okay you're gonna do a sequel it's gonna be basically the same movie they've done about a billion times now with just the monster killing everything and never being able to die but the whole town sort of like finally come into the realization that we can't let this secret like die again only to crop back up is pretty cool and also that shot's awesome yeah just the shot of it this shot right here that's coming up that's terrifying right there where you just see it through the perspective of just the tiny little glass in the fireman's mask face mask is cool oh that's cool because that's such an iconic halloween thing too that point of view shot through that point you shot through the mask yeah that's true a good point man and just like god bless jamie jamie lee curtis for just like being like i'm full in on these let's go i've had an amazing career and you know what let's just make more halloween movies let's make them awesome well it was made by danny mcbride if you

just like being like i'm full in on these let's go i've had an amazing career and you know what let's just make more halloween movies let's make them awesome well it was made by danny mcbride if you remember he was the one that was like it was just like i'm writing this [ __ ] and it was [ __ ] great oh man really exciting stuff mike what'd this do for you uh it got me excited tim i i'm a big horror baby but i'll tell you what the 2018 one was a fun ride and i look forward to this i like the idea of the town against michael and i'm in for that i'm excited and we get to see cool kill sequences like that lady getting jammed with the lights that was insane yeah that's so those masks like the three masks here are from halloween three yeah that's the one you love right the one that uses the best no your favorite one michael myers great that bad of a movie just it wasn't it's just a departure yeah maybe we can expand the halloween franchise no we cannot all right well i am sure this will

best no your favorite one michael myers great that bad of a movie just it wasn't it's just a departure yeah maybe we can expand the halloween franchise no we cannot all right well i am sure this will end in us doing a halloween in review and i'm very very excited about all but let us know in the comments below how excited you are for halloween kills oh man i'm very excited but until next time love you guys bye
